thread.title: HMS Collingwood personnel support VC Memorial Fund (Royal Navy)
thread.title_full: HMS Collingwood personnel support VC Memorial Fund (Royal Navy) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: HMS Collingwood personnel support VC Memorial Fund (Royal Navy)
text: (Source: Royal Navy) 07/10/2015 Continuing their participation with raising money for the Able Seaman Albert McKenzie VC Memorial Fund, the Close Range and Naval Military Training Element (CRNMTE) were invited to Millwall Football Club. As VIP guests for the Millwall vs Southend game, this allowed them to collect donations across the football ground. Before kick off the CRNMTE personnel teamed with Southwark Sea Cadet Unit collected donations of over £1600. The groups then formed a guard of honour on the pitch for both team’s players and were hosted throughout the match and afterwards at the Stansfeld, Oxford Bermondsey Club. Over the past 18 months over £12,000 has been raised through a number of events towards the fund including a battlefield tour of the Mole at Zeebrugge in Belgium and involvement in the creation of the monument. distributed by This content was issued by Royal Navy on the 2015-10-07 and was initially posted on www.royalnavy.mod.uk. It was distributed, unedited and unaltered, by noodls on 2015-10-08 10:49:14 UTC. The original issuer is solely responsible for the accuracy of the information contained therein. (noodl: 30236252)
